programmes.show_description: Fancy a mash up after midnight? Only massive, ad free anthems to help with your insomnia! More beats, less sleep!
Let's go way back with some classic throwback hits, long forgotten beats and some good old fashioned rave anthems!

programmes.show_name: Take Me To The Clouds Above!
programmes.show_description: The sound that started it all! Join us for a selection of legendary Clubland classics. Expect high-energy beats, the biggest vocal anthems and feel good party vibe for all!
The 90s was obviously the greatest decade for dance, wasn't it? We pitch the 50 best 90s dance anthems against the 50 biggest bangers of the 00s. Who wins? You decide!
No excuses, stop what you are doing, turn it up and party hard with the biggest anthems and classic tracks of the noughties!
Kickstart your weekend with Clubland's electrifying 00s Warm Up! Get ready for non-stop floorfillers with over 50 iconic party anthems from 2000 to 2009.
The weekend has landed so let's get it started the Clubland way. No less than four hours of 90s floor fillers and party starters! Over 50 fab anthems from 1990 to 1999.

Need a fix of 90s club classics? Lock in for a marathon of memories as we take you back to the greatest decade of dance! The 90s!
The late 80s and early 90s: the authorities hated it, the media attacked it, but the people loved it!
Massive tunes and huge anthems. Each track a chart topping No.1 dance hit! This is the best of the best, these are the legends.
Need a fix of 90s club classics? Lock in for a marathon of memories as we take you back to the greatest decade of dance! The 90s!
Everybody's free to feel good and Rozalla knows it! So let's join her as she takes us on a journey of her 40 favourite feel good anthems from back in the day.

programmes.show_name: The Old Skool Night Of Your Life!
programmes.show_description: Join us for the old skool night of your life. Massive party tunes, huge old skool bangers and some epic euphoria. From 1990 to 2010.
